who we are
THE RARE DISEASE COMPANY

Revolutionising Genetic Solutions

Our Mission

We empower innovative patient-centric solutions for the global rare disease community. Our unique solutions accelerate orphan drug development by years, immeasurably de-risking the process for our pharma partners.

Our vision is simple – to bring rare diseases out of the shadow and underline once and for all that ‘rare’ is everywhere. Rare is 350 million strong. We are here to put rare in the spotlight.

Pharma Solutions

  • Unsurpassed data set massively accelerates and de-risks orphan drug development
  • With blood-derived quantifiable biomarkers, the future of therapy is personalized
  • Real-life patient data from around the world offers game-changing biological insights
i

More info

Patient Solutions

  • Latest technology erases years from diagnostic odysseys
  • Clinical studies and research offer new insights into treatments
  • Over 250,000 patients per year are identified globally using the highest quality of diagnosis
i

More info

Knowledge Solutions

  • The largest mutation database of rare diseases in the world
  • Combining genomics, proteomics, and metabolomics offers unique pharma solutions
  • Curated technology and high throughput clinical routines brings rationality to imprecise processes
